moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Tickle
moves.description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Play Nice
moves.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Tickle
moves.description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Embargo
moves.description: It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Psyshock
moves.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

moves.name: Flatter
moves.description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, it also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Heal Block
moves.description: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Telekinesis
moves.description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Magic Room
moves.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.
